<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/block/{heightOrHash}/transactions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all transactions for a block the block's height or blockhash.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
